Elephants are the largest living land animals, reaching up to heights of 13 feet and weighing up to 11 tons.

The African elephant is the largest land animal on Earth, with males weighing up to 6 tons and standing up to 3.3 meters tall at the shoulder. The Asian elephant is slightly smaller, with males weighing up to 5 tons and standing up to 2.7 meters tall at the shoulder.
